ai-patthana12.14:0.2_0: At the place where the nature of the Dhamma is used, unqualified,
ai-patthana12.14:1.1_0: You shouldn’t give a teaching for the sake of refuge ...
ai-patthana12.14:1.1_1: You shouldn’t give rise to the cause for refuge.
ai-patthana12.14:1.1_2: not with the teaching associated with the Teaching,
ai-patthana12.14:1.1_3: One is the reason why the object of construction ...
ai-patthana12.14:1.1_5: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana12.14:2.1_0: You should not give a teaching for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana12.14:2.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana12.14:3.1_0: You shouldn’t give rise to the sake of refuge (in Buddha),
ai-patthana12.14:3.1_1: It is not possible for refuge to have causes and reasonedness for the sake of suffering,
ai-patthana12.14:3.1_2: You shouldn’t give rise to the teaching for refuge.
ai-patthana12.14:3.1_3: They’re not able to teach Dhamma for the sake of refuge.
ai-patthana12.14:3.1_6: What is not the reason for two reasons.
ai-patthana12.14:4.1_0: You shouldn’t give a teaching for the sake of refuge,
ai-patthana12.14:5.1_3: What is not the reason for two reasons.
